name: Beanstream-for-woocommerce
body:
### Beanstream
Beanstream allows you to process credit cards through its gateway. This plugin aims to show anyone that they can use Beanstream to take credit card payments in their WooCommerce store without having to write a single line of code. All you have to do is copy Merchand id and API pass key to a settings page and you're done.

### Get Credentials from Beanstream
You need to have an active gateway account with Beanstream.
* Login to your [Beanstream](https://www.beanstream.com/admin/sDefault.asp)
* In the top right corner of your account dashboard will be a “Welcome” message.  Under this is a field labeled “Merchant ID” and Find 'API access passcode' inside the Order settings page.
* Copy these two values to your Woo Commerce Beanstream settings page and “Save Settings”

### Frequently Asked Questions
1. Does I need to have an SSL Certificate?
+ Yes you do. For any transaction involving sensitive information, you should take security seriously, and credit card information is incredibly sensitive. This plugin disables itself if you try to process live transactions without an SSL certificate. You can read [Beanstream's reasaoning for using SSL here](http://developer.beanstream.com/tag/ssl/).

### Authors and Contributors
If you'd like to contribute, feel free to tackle a feature or fix a bug and when you're ready, send a pull request. If you'd like to get more involved than that, please e-mail me at vkuberan@outlook.com or follow me on Velmurugan Kuberan (@vkuberan)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
